description:
Imagine you created this awesome Python project.

But before you want to release it to the world, you want to make sure it
follows the Python coding standards.

You have heard of Flake8, but you are unsure whether you should install
it system-wide, run it in your IDE or in even in CI?

How and where should you configure Flake8?

How do you make sure your colleagues also use the same linters... in the
same version?
title: Tool Confusion: Pythonic Code with flake8, tox and pre-commit
